analysis.description:
Reentrancy in IMPCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_contracts/0x07fd02fe0bd6412249ff3d66c23d5bdadba18b75.sol#707-730):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(totalSold <= token.totalSupply().div(100).mul(percentLimit)) (/unique_contracts/0x07fd02fe0bd6412249ff3d66c23d5bdadba18b75.sol#711-712)
	- tokens = _getTokenAmount(weiAmount) (/unique_contracts/0x07fd02fe0bd6412249ff3d66c23d5bdadba18b75.sol#717-719)
	- _processPurchase(tokens) (/unique_contracts/0x07fd02fe0bd6412249ff3d66c23d5bdadba18b75.sol#723)
	External calls sending eth:
	- _forwardFunds() (/unique_contracts/0x07fd02fe0bd6412249ff3d66c23d5bdadba18b75.sol#726-727)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalSold (/unique_contracts/0x07fd02fe0bd6412249ff3d66c23d5bdadba18b75.sol#728-729)

IMPCrowdsale.manualTokenTransfer (/unique_contracts/0x07fd02fe0bd6412249ff3d66c23d5bdadba18b75.sol#743-754) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(initialOwner,_to,_value) (/unique_contracts/0x07fd02fe0bd6412249ff3d66c23d5bdadba18b75.sol#749-752)

IMPCrowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_contracts/0x07fd02fe0bd6412249ff3d66c23d5bdadba18b75.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(initialOwner,msg.sender,_tokenAmount) (/unique_contracts/0x07fd02fe0bd6412249ff3d66c23d5bdadba18b75.sol)

Reentrancy in IMPCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_contracts/0x07fd02fe0bd6412249ff3d66c23d5bdadba18b75.sol#707-730):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(totalSold <= token.totalSupply().div(100).mul(percentLimit)) (/unique_contracts/0x07fd02fe0bd6412249ff3d66c23d5bdadba18b75.sol#711-712)
	- tokens = _getTokenAmount(weiAmount) (/unique_contracts/0x07fd02fe0bd6412249ff3d66c23d5bdadba18b75.sol#717-719)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- weiRaised (/unique_contracts/0x07fd02fe0bd6412249ff3d66c23d5bdadba18b75.sol#722-723)
